product_name: Kiss My Face Face Factor Sunscreen SPF 30 - 1.5 fl. oz. - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Formulated to help prevent the damaging effects of sun exposure, this face sunscreen contains an abundance of botanicals, oat protein and aloe to protect, moisturize and soothe.
short_description: Formulated to help prevent the damaging effects of sun exposure, this face sunscreen contains an abundance of botanicals, oat protein and aloe to protect, moisturize and soothe.
